thread.section_title: La Manufacture - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good stay, very obliging staff.
thread.title_full: Good stay, very obliging staff. - Review of La Manufacture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Travelisterrific
title: Good stay, very obliging staff.
text:
Would definitely stay here again.
Value rating because we we thought the cost with breakfast (we had room only) would have made the stay a little pricey.
I wish I could remember the name of the lady on reception am 24 March; she was most charming and helpful - it makes such a difference to deal with lovely staff. All staff were good.
Two friends (ladies), we had twins beds - really comfortable and the shower was very good.
Nice find.
